title: Metric `StateSynced` is not updating as expected
body:
Reported by user `guaxinim.sol` on discord:
```
Hey folks!
I'm currently trying to check my node's sync status through the Prometheus metrics module.
I was trying to use the nethermind_state_synced metric but I've queried the last 30 days and it kept 0 (not synced as mentioned by @OlegJakushkin here: https://discord.com/channels/629004402170134531/629004402170134537/1046663414988165120). 
I've made eth_syncing  and eth_blockNumber node calls in order to confirm sync status, but they showed my node was perfectly synced.

Have you ever seen this behavior before? 
How can I set/configure Prometheus metrics to properly shows sync state over nethermind_state_syncedmetrics?

BTW, I was browsing the metrics docs and I ran into nethermind_blockchain_height and I was thinking to evaluate node's head lag roughly by subtracting (nethermind_blockchain_height - nethermind_blocks) as a temp fix/workaround, but I've realized that nethermind_blockchain_height simply gone on nethermind v1.14.7. Am I missing something here?

Nethermind version: v1.14.7
Specs: 8 CPU - 64GB RAM
Platform: Docker

I appreciate your help guys ðŸ™‚
```
link to msg above: https://discord.com/channels/629004402170134531/629004402170134537/1054901170868596748

I took a look on our grafana and can confirm that we have `StateSynced = 0` on many synced nodes
